Draft Rating:

C+

Norm Sonju ranks in the 57th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Sonju's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 1 spot higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Jason Kidd with 2th pick but was worth 1th pick.
  • Drafted Derek Harper with 11th pick but was worth 3th pick.
  • Drafted Detlef Schrempf with 8th pick but was worth 5th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Sam Perkins with 4th pick but was worth 6th pick.
  • Drafted Mark Aguirre with 1th pick but was worth 3th pick.
  • Drafted Bill Garnett with 4th pick but was worth 38th pick.

Trade Rating:

B+

Norm Sonju ranks in the 78th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Rodney McCray, Mike Iuzzolino to DAL.
  • Lost Bill Wennington, Duane Causwell, Travis Mays to SAC.
Their biggest L:
  • Lost Mark Price to CLE.

Signing Rating:

B

Norm Sonju ranks in the 72th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed George McCloud in 1995.
  • Signed Brad Davis in 1980.
  • Signed Anthony Jones in 1989.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Terry Davis in 1991.
  • Signed Scott Lloyd in 1980.
  • Signed Lorenzo Williams in 1994.
